alert.note: Alert for Central Highlands; Chuska Mountains; East Slopes Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Northeast Highlands; Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains; South Central Mountains; Southern Sangre de Cristo Mountains; West Central Mountains (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 19 at 1:11AM MDT until April 19 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM THIS MORNING TO 8 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest to west winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Sangre de Cristo Mountains, Chuska Mountains, West Central Mountains, Central Highlands, South Central Mountains, and Northeast Highlands. * WHEN...From 9 AM this morning to 8 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs may be blown down. Expect strong crosswinds on area roadways.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Central Highlands; Chuska Mountains; East Slopes Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Northeast Highlands; Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains; South Central Mountains; Southern Sangre de Cristo Mountains; West Central Mountains
